DOC.brief_summary: Supraglottic airway device ( SADs ) well establish pediatric anesthetic practice . The pediatric i-gel self-pressurised air-Q ( air-Q ) new supraglottic airway device child . The i-gel made soft , gel-like elastomer noninflatable cuff . The air-Q new single-use device may optimise airway seal reduce potential postoperative complication sore throat . The overall structure air-Q SP identical original air-Q , except regard inflatable cuff . The aim randomize trial compare clinical performance i-gel air-Q SP .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison I-gel Self-pressurised Air-Q Intubating Laryngeal Airway Children
